task: Develop a basic 'Hearts' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Assemble some of the instruments in a group and treat the group'.
name: Heartstrings

branding_data.short_description: Heartstrings: A unique twist on the classic card game 'Hearts', featuring collaborative group strategy elements.
branding_data.detailed_description: Heartstrings is an innovative adaptation of the traditional card game 'Hearts', where players are challenged to avoid collecting hearts and the queen of spades. This version introduces a creative twist inspired by the oblique strategy 'Assemble some of the instruments in a group and treat the group'. Players must form temporary alliances to manage their cards as a group, adding layers of strategic depth and collaboration. The game maintains the core mechanics of 'Hearts' while encouraging players to think collectively, fostering a unique social dynamic and making each round unpredictable and engaging.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
strategy: Assemble some of the instruments in a group and treat the group
